Package ulb.infof307.g02.database

Class DatabaseManager

java.lang.Object
ulb.infof307.g02.database.DatabaseManager
public class DatabaseManager extends Object
DatabaseManager is a tool used to manage the database access. The singleton design pattern is used to keep the DatabaseManager instantiations to only one, making it easier to set options if necessary.
